content: the crochet pattern is for the baby size only to avoid any confusion the full size pattern is now available as a separate listing the sand & sea blanket is a great baby blanket for a beginner crocheter or any skill level it s relaxing just like the sand & sea and exactly what most of us need from time to time finished size 31 5 x 34 5 yarn used caron cotton cakes #4 worsted weight in beachglass 2 8 8 oz cakes / 1060 yds hook size i/9 5 50 mm skill level this is a beginner level pattern with easy to follow instructions you will need to be familiar with basic crochet stitches all patterns are in english and written in standard us terms
